INNOVATIVE THINKING
FUTURISTIC SOLUTIONS

Who we are, what we do

The pace of latest technologies, the speed of business transformations and the rate of change in end-user expectations are making new demands on industries worldwide. Businesses are constantly facing new alternatives, and technology convergence in IT-driven industry is accelerating. Todayâ€™s technology and infrastructure must be able to predict change before it happens and respond quickly to deliver business outcomes. In short, your current technology and infrastructure models must be ready for a digital tomorrow.

It is only through innovation that we can bring about such avant-garde transformations. More radical and transformational than improvement, innovation is process oriented and requires out-of-the-box thinking. At Innovation Endeavors, we re-imagine technology and infrastructure together as a transformational force that help organizations adapt to change at a faster rate.

In essence, we re-imagine tomorrow, today.

Our Vision

To conceptualize, design, develop and execute world class custom infrastructure and business solutions through technological interventions.

Our Services

TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS

IOT, DATA ANALYTICS & PROCESS
IMPROVEMENT SOLUTIONS
  • Providing information & data to customers relating to business improvement, process improvement, modifications, automation solutions, competition, market trends, audience analysis, organization, business plans etc.
  • Rendering and providing financial advices and solutions and related services
  • Business information services and business management services, training and consultancy services
  • Conduct of studies, research and marketing of information and services
  • Providing access to information regarding financial operations and management, business and commercial operations
  • Providing information regarding consumer responses and management of businesses of all kinds and descriptions

INFRASTRUCTURE FOR IT & TECHNOLOGY-BASED INDUSTRIES

  • Providing Infrastructure & infrastructure services including conceiving, designing, planning, investing, constructing, developing, operating, managing IT & technology based industries.
  • Data Center Infrastructure

CONSULTANCY SERVICES

  • Providing management consultancy services, financial consultancy services and human resources consultancy.
  • Establishing and operating specialized skill development centers.
  • Providing project advisory services to businesses and organizations.

CORE VALUES

  • Global Standard and Competence: Team innovation is committed to deliver services to our clients maintaining global standards and competence.
  • Transparency and Integrity: Team innovation firmly believes in transparency and integrity in all endeavors

SPEARHEADING INNOVATION
IN SERVICES AND MANUFACTURING

Innovation Endeavors, with our technology partners, provide technology solutions to services and manufacturing sectors.

Our smart shop floors solution helps managing geographically spread businesses. The solution converts the large volume of data into actionable insights, As the analytics are done in near real-time, informed business decisions can be taken on-the-go.

In the healthcare services segment, we offer tele-medicine solutions designed to support mid-size to large hospitals and radiology imaging centers. This move is in line with achieving our goals of improving patient satisfaction and healthcare outcomes. These solutions are already available in the US and Canada, and we have partnered with dozens of healthcare providers across US, Canada and India.

PROJECT CATEGORIES IN THE TECHNOLOGY INFRASTRUCTURE SPACE

Team

Innovation Endeavors is promoted by a group of Silicon Valley based senior technocrats, Team Innovation Endeavors India is capable of providing state of the art technological solutions for businesses of any size and magnitude. We form partnerships and strategic alliances with world-class organizations to expand our service offerings and deliver comprehensive solutions to clients. Such strategic alliances enable us to provide complete and futuristic solutions to business.

Technology Partners

IGDS Technologies is a product design and software development company that provides business consulting, information technology and business process outsourcing. IGDS has crafted advanced cloud-based solutions for companies working in Healthcare, Financial, Legal and Retail sectors.

Visit Site

Planet G SYSTEMS is an engineering company specialized in automation. Planet G provides custom solutions for a variety of applications - vision-based inspection systems and conveyor systems that reduce manual intervention and effort, thus increasing productivity.

Visit Site

SeeMyMachines is a cloud-based IOT platform that delivers near real-time insights into plant operations. The solution monitors and tracks machine performance, delivering insights into utilization and productivity of assets on the factory floor.
